import React from 'react'; import fullHeart from '../../assets/likedIMG.png'; // ---------------------------------- The 'Favorite Vacation' Component Is Defined Here ---------------------------------- // export default function FavoriteVacationComponent (props: any) { return (
props.OnUserDislikeClick(props.vacation)} src={fullHeart} alt="Like Button"/>

{props.vacation.followersCount}

{props.vacation.vacationName}

{props.vacation.startDate}

-

{props.vacation.endDate}

{props.vacation.vacationPrice} $

{props.vacation.vacationDescription}
) }
